name: Google Fold
description: Folds the Google bar and sidebars on the left side of Google sites until you hover over them. This generally un-clutters the page quite a bit.

user.name: endreman0
user.about: Moderate internet user and Firefox fanatic, but terrible web designer. Most of my styles will be utility styles rather than pretty things, because I have no sense of aesthetics.

additional_info:
2017-04-19: Google Drive left sidebar folding fixed.
2016-01-12: Dark theme support added for Google Calendar. This style no longer sets the sidebar's background color.
2016-01-10: Dark theme support added for Google Drive. This style no longer sets the sidebar's background color.
2016-01-09: Google Drive support added. Left sidebar folds away.
2016-12-30 (initial upload): Supports Google Calendar, Google Groups, and Gmail.
